name: Catch It! (David Jakubec)
description:
Catch It

Catch It is a 3D game, where you can catch fish. Your goal is to catch fish and make money, upgrade your skills and catch the boss fish on the bottom of the lake.

Game is made in Unity, Blender and UI is made in Inkscape.

Music:

nightWalk by airtone (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/airtone/56520
